pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graphical Modelling and Ordination using Copulas // Creates 'graphs' of species associations (interactions) and ordination biplots from co-occurrence data by fitting discrete gaussian copula graphical models. Methods described in Popovic, GC., Hui, FKC., Warton, DI., (2018) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2017.12.002.
